channel.title: LunarIsle - You Don't Know What You're Missing!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/Server.png[/img]
[url=http://lunarisle.com/]Play Now[/url] [url=http://lunarisle.com/forum/register.php]Register To Play[/url] [url=http://lunarisle.com/forum/]Forums[/url] [url=http://lunarisle.com/message/message_centre.php]Message Centre[/url] [url=http://lunarisle.com/message/]Offenses / Appeals[/url] [url=http://lunarisle.com/forum/payments.php]Membership[/url]
Specs; 64GB DDR3 RAM Intel Core i7 x 4 1GBPS Pipe
Information; LunarIsle has been known since 2011. And has been run under a previous name before hand. LunarIsle is your ideal 2009ish remake. If you like strong eco servers then this is certainly for you.
Features; RuneScape Message Centre // Offense & Appeal System // Blackmarks Highscores with fully functional compare users vBulletin integrated for automatic membership A Seriously stable economy Very competitive player base Every Single Skill Works Flawless Pking 3 voting stores Pk point store Custom info tab
Theres just so much to this server now its unreal.. Pictures say more than words..
Media;
[img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/1.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/2.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/3.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/4.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/5.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/6.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/7.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/8.png[/img]
COMING SOON...
[img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/9.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/10.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/11.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/12.png[/img] [img]http://lunarisle.com/images/advert/13.png[/img]

And the server i glitchy A.F.[/quote]

Elux
